document.title: Cover, Dedication, Preface, Contents
document.abstract: The cover, dedication, preface, and content pages from The ILR School at Fifty, a collection of reflections on the first fifty years of the School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University. Compiled by Robert B. McKersie, J. Gormly Miller, Robert L. Aronson, and Robert R. Julian. Edited by Elaine Gruenfeld Goldberg.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation
Gruenfeld Goldberg, E. (Ed). McKersie, R., Miller, J. Gormly, Aronson, R., & Julian, R. (Compilers). (1986). The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni & Friends. Ithaca, NY: Cornell University. http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/ilratfifty/1/
